entries.name: new(typelib, ole_class) → WIN32OLE_TYPE objectclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a new WIN32OLE_TYPE object. The first argument typelib specifies OLE type library name. The second argument specifies OLE class name.

entries.name: ole_classes(typelib)click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns array of WIN32OLE_TYPE objects defined by the typelib type library. This method will be OBSOLETE. Use WIN32OLE_TYPELIB.new.ole_classes instead.

entries.name: progidsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns array of ProgID.

entries.name: typelibsclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns array of type libraries. This method will be OBSOLETE. Use WIN32OLE_TYPELIB.typelibs.collect{|t| t.name} instead.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#default_event_sourcesclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the array of WIN32OLE_TYPE object which is implemented by the WIN32OLE_TYPE object and having IMPLTYPEFLAG_FSOURCE and IMPLTYPEFLAG_FDEFAULT.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#default_ole_typesclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the array of WIN32OLE_TYPE object which is implemented by the WIN32OLE_TYPE object and having IMPLTYPEFLAG_FDEFAULT.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#guid  #=> GUIDclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns GUID.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#helpcontextclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns helpcontext. If helpcontext is not found, then returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#helpfileclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns helpfile path. If helpfile is not found, then returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#helpstring #=> help string.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns help string.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#implemented_ole_typesclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the array of WIN32OLE_TYPE object which is implemented by the WIN32OLE_TYPE object.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#inspect → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the type name with class name.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#major_versionclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns major version.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#minor_version #=> OLE minor versionclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns minor version.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#name #=> OLE type nameclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns OLE type name.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#ole_methods # the array of WIN32OLE_METHOD objects.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns array of WIN32OLE_METHOD objects which represent OLE method defined in OLE type library.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#ole_type #=> OLE type string.click to toggle source
entries.desc: returns type of OLE class.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#ole_typelibclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the WIN32OLE_TYPELIB object which is including the WIN32OLE_TYPE object. If it is not found, then returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#progid  #=> ProgIDclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns ProgID if it exists. If not found, then returns nil.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#source_ole_typesclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the array of WIN32OLE_TYPE object which is implemented by the WIN32OLE_TYPE object and having IMPLTYPEFLAG_FSOURCE.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#src_type #=> OLE source classclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns source class when the OLE class is 'Alias'.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#typekind #=> number of type.click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns number which represents type.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#variablesclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns array of WIN32OLE_VARIABLE objects which represent variables defined in OLE class.

entries.name: WIN32OLE_TYPE#visible?  #=> true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the OLE class is public.

entries.name: to_s()
entries.desc: Alias for: name
